BlogPost.title: A Break in the Chaos
BlogPost.text: It's Wednesday night around 11:15 PM.&nbsp; Jen's asleep, the dog's asleep, and I'm just finishing up another frantic week in school.&nbsp; I truly cannot believe how little time it leaves me in my life.&nbsp; Between work, every day todo type of stuff, and school work, I have almost no time to do the things I love.&nbsp; A little under 2 years to go, and it will be all over.&nbsp; By then, I'll have a child or two, and life will be completely different again.&nbsp; Such is life!<br><br><img src="http://www.atomvoyages.com/images/AtomSunset02kb35_small.jpg"><br><br>I encourage you to read this site.&nbsp; It's about a guy who sails around the world a few times with no motor.&nbsp; I loved reading it.&nbsp; <a href="http://www.atomvoyages.com">http://www.atomvoyages.com</a><br>
